20101224164030.000|20101224164034.000|CC1|BEING DIAGNOSED, RACHAEL, NOW A 
20101224164034.000|20101224164034.000|CC1|COLLEGE FRESHMAN, HAS NO SIGNS  
20101224164034.000|20101224164038.000|CC1|OF SLOWING DOWN.                
20101224164038.000|20101224164040.000|CC1|>> FROM THE MINUTE I GOT OUT OF 
20101224164040.000|20101224164042.000|CC1|MY SURGERY, I KNEW I WANTED TO  
20101224164042.000|20101224164044.000|CC1|DO SOMETHING, NO MATTER WHAT IT 
20101224164044.000|20101224164044.000|CC1|WAS.                            
20101224164044.000|20101224164046.000|CC1|IT MAY ONE DAY BE ABLE TO CURE  
20101224164046.000|20101224164050.000|CC1|ALL THE KIDS.                   
20101224164050.000|20101224164052.000|CC1|>> AND RACHAEL SAID SHE WANTS TO
20101224164052.000|20101224164054.000|CC1|BE A NURSE ONE DAY AND HER      
20101224164054.000|20101224164055.000|CC1|FUTURE IS WIDE OPEN, JUST THE   
20101224164055.000|20101224164056.000|CC1|WAY SHE WANTS IT.               
20101224164056.000|20101224164058.000|CC1|FOR NOW, SHE'S KEEPING BUSY WITH
20101224164058.000|20101224164100.000|CC1|HER JEWELRY AND IT'S KEEPING HER
20101224164100.000|20101224164101.000|CC1|VERY BUSY.                      
20101224164101.000|20101224164102.000|CC1|>> WHAT AN AMAZING YOUNG WOMAN.
